title: Are there no more AP Life Steal items that don't also have a mana mechanism?
body:
Wondering if there is a LifeSteal item to buy on Rumble for instance who wouldn't use a RoA since he doesn't use mana. Don't really want a hybrid item since I'm not really doing a ton of physical damage until I'm overheated. 

For some reason the Riot Boards think I'm level 6 so I can't post anywhere but to Help??? I'm actually level 32 or something.

replies.body:
Posting here in H&S can push through a sync to get those levels matched up again, looks like it worked since I'm seeing you as level 34 now.

As far as I know about AP items and Lifesteal, I think there's only 1 currently: Hextech Gunblade.
